name: Daxter and Secret Agent Clank
description:
Two of PlayStation Portable's most popular action/adventure games, Daxter® and Secret Agent Clank™, are now available in a Dual Pack. Half otter, half weasel, all trouble, Daxter® has sold over 600,000 units in his first starring role. In Secret Agent Clank™ the secret agent is the gadget!




Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service, this item’s use restrictions, and other applicable terms located at http://www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
